name: Bun Bun's Big Run
description:
Bun Bun and her wife Bonnie were frolicking in the forest when the evil soldier comes to steal Bonnie as a pet for the king! It's up to Bun Bun to have the biggest run of her life to save her!

Created as part of the RPG Maker Mini Game Contest with the following rules:

-Default graphics

-A great minigame!

The game itself includes the following:

-Speed up power ups

-A Working Hud displaying HP, the current powerup active and your current score

-Enemies with set move routes to memorize and pass through

-Enemies that follow you to increase difficulty

-A moderate difficulty all around, with the real challenge being to get the highest score possible AND make it to the end!
